title: IObit Driver Booster Pro 2.3.1.0
description:
IObit Driver Booster is the easiest and most effective tool driver update, which quickly scans your Windows system for out-of-date drivers, then downloads, installs and replaces them with one click. It protects your software conflicts computer, hardware failures and resolve system failure problems caused by outdated drivers. The program will automatically identify your hardware, and then seek to ensure that each piece of hardware have the latest device driver installed. Any driver problems can be fixed with a few clicks of your mouse. All older drivers can be detected, just click on the "Scan" button, and then you just need to click "Update All" button to update these outdated drivers. Compared to other driver update tools, IObit booster driver can improve PC performance for gaming as well. IObit booster Driver excels in its simple and easy to use interface. There is no research around trying to decide what you need to do: just launch the program, it immediately scans your PC, and a detailed report appears a few seconds later.
